title: Visionary environment
text: A visionary environment or fantasy world is a large <a href="Installation%20art">artistic installation</a>, often on the scale of a building or <a href="sculpture%20park">sculpture park</a>s, intended to express a vision of its creator. The subjective and personal nature of these projects often implies a marginal status for the artists involved, and there is a strong association between visionary environments and <a href="outsider%20art">outsider art</a>.
